trans-unit.source: Specifies a property or field to update or a method to run using the CodeDom types.
trans-unit.target: Especifica uma propriedade ou campo update ou de um método para serem executados utilizando os tipos de CodeDom.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction"></xref> class using a <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction"> </xref> classe utilizando um <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"></xref> specifying the action to perform.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"> </xref> especificar a ação a executar.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction"></xref> class using a <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeStatement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction"> </xref> classe utilizando um <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeStatement"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeStatement"></xref> specifying the action to perform.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeStatement"> </xref> especificar a ação a executar.

trans-unit.source: Creates a deep copy of the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cópia profunda da atual <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> that is identical to this instance.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"> </xref> que é idêntica a esta instância.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the code statement specifying the action to perform.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a instrução de código que especifica a ação a executar.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeStatement"></xref> specifying the action to perform.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeStatement"> </xref> especificar a ação a executar.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two object instances are equal.
trans-unit.target: Determina se as duas instâncias de objeto são iguais.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to compare with the current <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>A comparar com a atual <xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object> </xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the objects are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se os objetos são iguais; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Executes the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> using the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExecution"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Executa o <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"> </xref> utilizando especificado <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExecution"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExecution"></xref> context used to execute the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExecution"> </xref> contexto utilizado para executar o <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o código hash para esta instância.

trans-unit.source: The hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: O código hash para esta instância.

trans-unit.source: Returns the fields and properties updated by a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve os campos e propriedades atualizadas por um <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation"></xref> to manage the validation process.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation"> </xref> para gerir o processo de validação.

trans-unit.source: A list of the fields and properties changed by a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma lista de campos e propriedades foi alterada por um <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the string value of the action.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o valor da cadeia da ação.

trans-unit.source: The string value of the action.
trans-unit.target: O valor da cadeia da ação.

trans-unit.source: Verifies that the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> is configured correctly and has no errors.
trans-unit.target: Verifica se o <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"> </xref> está configurado corretamente e não tem erros.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction> contains errors (the Validate method returns false), then <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation.Errors%2A?displayProperty=fullName> will contain the list of errors encountered.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction>contém erros (o método Validate devolve um valor false), em seguida, <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation.Errors%2A?displayProperty=fullName>irá conter a lista de erros encontrados.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation.Errors%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation"></xref> to manage the validation process.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation"> </xref> para gerir o processo de validação.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> had no errors; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"> </xref> tinha sem erros; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
